name: The Brave Little Fusionista
description:
You ever feel like buying a bar or a yacht on a whim? No, because a yacht costs millions? Ok, but did you ever think about buying a nuclear power plant? Probably yes!

Actually, the fashionista in this game misread the fine and large print in his contract when buying property (the curse of wearing stylish fake glasses when you need real ones). Now, he is the proud owner of the country's first nuclear fusion plant. But fusion and fashion nearly sound the same, so how hard can it really be?
